thoughts.text: It seems like the Rosetta Stone repository on GitHub does not exist. I can use the google command to search for an alternative way to install Rosetta Stone on my system.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the google command, I can search for an alternative way to install Rosetta Stone on my system. This will allow me to use the app to learn different languages.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to search for an alternative way to install Rosetta Stone on my system
- Install Rosetta Stone manually
- Use the app to learn different languages
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on language learning apps. It's important to also practice speaking and listening to the language with native speakers.
thoughts.speak: It seems like the Rosetta Stone repository on GitHub does not exist. I can use the google command to search for an alternative way to install Rosetta Stone on my system. What should I search for?

args.query: How to install Rosetta Stone on Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)
